description:
This installment of the Fuckfest series brings us veterans Zack and Trevor, relative newcomers Isaak, Jase, and Paulo, and a brand new guy, Grady.
Grady had sent us an e-mail a while back expressing an interest in being in a video. He said that he loves big cocks and would jump at the opportunity to get Zack's big dick up his ass. I love viewer participation, so we invited him out and gave him not just one big cock, but several.
By the end of filming, the sheets on the bed were absolutely soaked and Grady had a big smile on his face.
title: Fuckfest 3
